publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4769.1# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4769) in the name of Karen Whitefield, insert at end "and believes that the project should include a station at Blackridge which would serve the communities of Blackridge, Greenrigg and Harthill." Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Murdo Fraser*, Dave Petrie*, Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4769.1# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4769) in the name of Karen Whitefield, insert at end "and believes that the project should include a station at Blackridge which would serve the communities of Blackridge, Greenrigg and Harthill." Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Murdo Fraser, Dave Petrie, Chris Ballance, Robin Harper, Colin Fox*, Fiona Hyslop*, John Scott*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4769.1# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 14 September 2006) Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-4769.1# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 14 September 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4769.1# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 14 September 2006) Margo MacDonald*
